# Change Log

## [0.0.4](https://github.com/dldevinc/sanic-conf/tree/v0.0.4) - 2020-11-03
- Since Sanic 20.9.0 `config.from_object` is deprecated.
- Make `settings` instance lazy.

- **Yanked**

- **Yanked**
